cmd:
#coding:utf8
import re
import requests

query = "{{input}}"
if re.findall(r'^(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]\d|\d)(?:\.(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]\d|\d)){3}$', query):
	g = requests.get('https://whois.pconline.com.cn/ip.jsp?ip=' + query).content
	print g.decode("gb18030").encode("utf8")
else:
	g = requests.get('https://tcc.taobao.com/cc/json/mobile_tel_segment.htm?tel=' + query).content
	print g.decode("gb18030").encode("utf8")

cmds.label: 手机号、IP 归属地查询

features.explain: 手机号、IP 归属地查询
